thread.title: I Still Love Pagani For This
thread.title_full: I Still Love Pagani For This

author: Raphael Orlove
title: I Still Love Pagani For This
text:
Go to permalink GIF 
I bumped into this video again today for no good reason. I was on the internet, I thought of car sounds and invariably I ended up here. 
It’s Pagani doing some test runs in the then-new Zonda F, the best Pagani , for some guests of the company. Does Pagani do these test runs on a track? Nope. Pagani does them on the side street that leads up to their old, minute factory not far from Modena. Pagani Zonda F: Jalopnik Fantasy Garage Pagani Zonda F: Jalopnik Fantasy Garage Pagani Zonda F: Jalopnik Fantasy Garage Quite possibly the most beautiful, stunning sports racing cars in history were the Group C Le Mans… Read more Read more 
It’s like this, the Lamborghini 60 Minutes piece and I don’t even know what else when you want to show the vibe of what a supercar company is all about. Sheer madness and also a car. Aw Yea
